english.segment1: I'm finding it hard, hard to take. Mistakes we have made. Ignoring the ones. that we hold dear. Out of selfishness
english.segment2: All these things distract. our eyes and steal our time
english.segment3: Why do we keep fighting, but saying everything's alright?. We all see the same things why can't we stand side by side?. United together, we can change the world
english.segment4: I'm learning to take the smallest steps, and making a way. Can You take anymore?. Can You stand by while our world crashes down?
english.segment5: Be the spark, forsake your pride, set things right
